original_text: Also every sickness, and every plague, which is not written in the book of this law, them will the Lord bring upon thee, until thou be destroyed.
korean_text: 또 이 율법책에 기록하지 아니한 모든 질병과 모든 재앙을 네가 멸망하기까지 여호와께서 네게 내리실 것이니

sentences.original_text: which is not written in the book of this law
sentences.korean_translation: 이 율법 책에 기록되지 않은 것들을

sentences.original_text: them will the Lord bring upon thee
